transcript:
Customer: Ji madam.
Hanji Rajveer ji bol rahe hain?
Customer: Hanji hanji madam bol raha hun.
Namaste bhi aapke yahan se na call lead aayi hai customer care se jisme aapne.
Customer: Hanji madam abhi 10-15 din se na jo bhi ye bilkul bekar service mil rahi hai. Na koi lead aa raha hai na kuch aa raha hai.
Leading supplier preferred leader le lo ye le lo.
Kaam kuch nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek minute ek minute madam. Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wo bhej dega motorcycle se wahan.
Transport mein seedha.
Han wahan pe loading wala bhi 500 rupay lega wo load karwa dega.
5 baje to wo band kar dega na main ka baat to yahi hai.
Wo bola aap dekh lo jaisa karna hai.
Usne yahi bola baki aap dekh lo number de diya hun aapko aap baat kar lo nahi to.
Customer: Hanji madam boliye.
Executive: Haan aap ye keh rahe the leads nahi aa rahi aap ye bata rahe na ek hafte se.
Customer: Bilkul madam bilkul madam. Ek hafte se jyada hi ho gaya 15 din maan ke chalo.
Executive: Haan chaliye 15 din ka hi agar main batau. Abhi maine aapka isme check kiya lead consumption jo aap kar rahe the. Aapne aaj ki date mein paanch valid already consume kari hai aur agar main matlab last ke kuch din ki bhi baat karu.
Customer: Madam main mujhe ye batao preferred maine preferred leader liya hua hai gym setup ki wo kitni consume ki hai wo mujhe batao aap.
Executive: Nahi preferred leader ki leads hum to overall aapko jo leads de rahe hain wo to mila kar ke hi aapko bata rahi hun na usme aapne jo milti hai leads usme aapne har ek din mein.
Customer: Madam ye jo paanch uthai hai na ye jabardasti uthai kisi ne.
Customer ko utha liya ye utha liya kuch dikhe kuch nahi dikh raha hai to humne utha li.
To aap ko jani hai usse badhiya utha lo.
Executive: Achha to isme aapke lead consume karte ho aur aap sari aise hi kar rahe ho kya?
Customer: Bilkul jo hamara maan lijiye outdoor gym ka aa gaya ya jisme humne preferred leader le rakha hai uska to kuch aa hi nahi raha na.
A hi raha hai.
Executive: Ye dikhai de rahi hai ye leads.
Customer: Kuch bhi nahi hai. 15 din se bilkul aisa lag raha hai ki jaise matlab MDC use kar raha hun bilkul basic plan jo aapka rehta hai.
Executive: Achha ye to jo bhi leads uthane jabardasti utha rahe hain ki bhai expire ho jayenge isse badhiya utha lo kuch kuch.
Achha main dekho isme agar aapko overall check karu to aapka mujhe abhi tak is November ke month mein 1 tarikh se 8 tarikh tak sorry 7 tarikh tak aapka gym setup lead aapka usme preferred chal raha hai na aapka leader gym setup mein.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Usme 13 valid consume aapki dikha raha hai iske alawa aapka dusra chal raha hai outdoor outdoor gym equipment mein chal raha hai usme aapne ek bhi lead consume nahi kari hai to isme.
Customer: Consume kaise kare madam system pe hi baithe rehte hain system pe hi ladke bithaye hue hain do do jaise hi click ki nahi karte tab tak expire.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Main ek cheez aapko batau aap main aapko 3 baje ke baad karu phone aa raha hai zara main 3 baje ke baad karta hun aapko.
Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving expected leads for 15 days.

- Feels forced to consume irrelevant leads.

- Preferred leads for gym setup not performing.



Resolution:

- Executive checked lead consumption details.

- Explained preferred leads are calculated overall.

- Mentioned 13 valid gym setup leads consumed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, preferred leads, gym setup
